I am an ecologist interested in Ecoinformatics, macroecology, Geographic Information Systems and biodiversity databases. Her research interests include the assessment of data quality and information gaps and how it affects our biodiversity knowledge. She is currently working as data technician in NICED project at MNCN. She was research assistant at SCENIC and UNITED, and participated in SoilSkin and Taxon-Time projects.
